DOC.brief_summary: Inhibition dipeptidyl peptidase-4 ( DPP-4 ) sodium-glucose co-transporter type 2 ( SGLT2 ) propose therapeutic target type 2 diabetes . However , DPP-4 inhibitor SGLT2 inhibitor exert protective action diabetic complication addition glucose-lowering effect remain unknown .
DOC.brief_title: Metabolic Cardiovascular Effects Dipeptidyl Peptidase-4 ( DPP-4 ) Sodium-glucose Co-transporter Type 2 ( SGLT2 ) Inhibitors
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis type 2 diabetic patient Must able swallow tablet never receive DPP4 inhibitor SGLT2 inhibitor uncontrolled diabetes ( fast plasma glucose > 200 mg/dL ) receive insulin therapy hepatic disorder ( 2.5 fold great increase aspartate transaminase alanine transaminase level upper limit normal ) inflammatory disorder neoplastic disorder recent ( < 3months ) acute coronary syndrome stroke acute infection
